panels.description: Memory usage over time - RSS and heap breakdown
panels.title: Memory Usage (RSS)

panels.title: Goroutines

panels.description: GC pause duration percentiles over time
panels.title: GC Pause Duration

panels.description: HTTP requests by method over time
panels.title: HTTP Requests by Method

panels.description: Active and idle database connections over time
panels.title: DB Connections

panels.description: BlobFS operations by type over time

targets.expr: sum by(operation)(increase(b3_blobfs_operations_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", operation!~"None|"}[$__rate_interval])) or on() vector(0)

panels.title: BlobFS Operations by Type

panels.description: BlobFS operations by storage type over time
panels.title: BlobFS Operations by Storage

panels.description: BlobFS errors by operation over time

targets.expr: sum by(operation)(increase(b3_blobfs_operations_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", success="false", operation!~"None|"}[$__rate_interval])) or on() vector(0)

panels.title: BlobFS Errors by Operation

panels.description: NATS disconnections by error type over time

targets.expr: sum by(error_type)(increase(b3_messaging_disconnect_count{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", error_type!~"None|"}[$__rate_interval])) or on() vector(0)

panels.title: NATS Disconnections by Error

panels.description: Authentication attempts by type over time

targets.expr: sum by(auth_type)(increase(b3_auth_attempts_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", auth_type!~"None|"}[$__rate_interval])) or on() vector(0)

panels.title: Authn Attempts by Type

panels.description: Authentication failures by type over time

targets.expr: sum by(auth_type)(increase(b3_auth_failures_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", auth_type!~"None|"}[$__rate_interval])) or on() vector(0)

panels.title: Authn Failures by Type
